local_intent: Prepare for grasp by detecting, approaching/aligning to the blue can, opening the gripper to 0.06 m, and verifying target visibility.
assumptions: Approach provides safe clearance without explicit MoveAbove step
coherence_with_global: Matches the global plan segment around OpenGripper: detect -> approach/align -> open gripper, then verify the target remains visible prior to computing grasp pose.
